description: Demolition of existing garage. Erection of a single storey front, side and rear extension
decision_conditions: The proposed front extension by reason of size, scale, bulk, projection and design would result in an incongruous and visually intrusive form of development that could not be considered to constitute subordinate addition to the existing dwellinghouse and in combination with the proposed extensions, failing to respect the architectural composition of the existing dwellinghouse resulting in a detrimental impact on the character and appearance of Dale Close. The proposal would therefore be contrary to Policy BE1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part One - Strategic Policies (2012), Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12 and DMHD 1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two- Development Management Policies (2020) and Chapter 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

The cumulative impact of the proposed roof extensions and the front/side/rear extensions by reason of size, scale, bulk, projection and design would result in an incongruous and visually intrusive form of development that could not be considered to constitute subordinate addition to the existing dwellinghouse, failing to respect the architectural composition of the existing dwellinghouse resulting in a detrimental impact on the character and appearance of Dale Close. The proposal would therefore be contrary to Policy BE1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part One - Strategic Policies (2012), Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12 and DMHD 1 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two- Development Management Policies (2020) and Chapter 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
